title: Node.js and Express.js Mastery
description: Master Node.js and Express.js to build scalable, high-performance backend applications. This comprehensive course covers server-side programming, RESTful API development, authentication, middleware, and real-time applications.
about: This course provides an in-depth understanding of building backend applications with Node.js and Express.js, including creating RESTful APIs, integrating databases, handling authentication, and managing real-time data with WebSockets.

highlights.name: Node.js Fundamentals
highlights.description: Learn the basics of Node.js, asynchronous programming, and event-driven architecture.

highlights.name: Express.js Framework
highlights.description: Master Express.js for building REST APIs, handling routing, and managing middleware.

highlights.name: Database Integration
highlights.description: Learn how to connect Node.js with databases like MongoDB, MySQL, and PostgreSQL.

highlights.name: Authentication and Security
highlights.description: Implement secure user authentication with JWT, OAuth, and Passport.js.

highlights.name: Real-Time Web Applications
highlights.description: Build real-time applications using WebSockets and technologies like Socket.io.

roles.title: Backend Developer
roles.description: Develop server-side applications, APIs, and manage databases using Node.js and Express.js.

roles.title: Full Stack Developer
roles.description: Combine frontend and backend technologies, integrating Node.js and Express.js with other web technologies.

roles.title: API Developer
roles.description: Specialize in building and maintaining APIs with Node.js and Express.js.

roles.title: Software Engineer
roles.description: Design and implement backend solutions, focusing on scalability and performance.

faq.question: Do I need prior programming knowledge for this course?
faq.answer: Basic knowledge of JavaScript and HTML/CSS is recommended, but the course also covers essential concepts from scratch.

faq.question: What projects will I work on during this course?
faq.answer: You will work on projects such as a RESTful API for a to-do app, a real-time chat application, and an e-commerce API with user authentication.

faq.question: Will the course cover database integration?
faq.answer: Yes, the course covers integrating both SQL (MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB) databases with your Node.js and Express.js applications.

faq.question: Will I receive a certificate after completing the course?
faq.answer: Yes, a certificate will be provided upon successful completion of the course.

faq.question: What tools and technologies will I use in this course?
faq.answer: You will use Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, MySQL, PostgreSQL, JWT, OAuth, Socket.io, and other backend technologies.
